Add wireless connectivity to the printer, allowing for easier printing from mobile devices.
Implement a mobile app that allows users to print remotely, track printing progress, and customize print settings.
Incorporate a touch screen interface on the printer, making it easier to navigate and control printing options.
Use machine learning algorithms to optimize printing settings for specific types of documents, such as photos or documents with complex graphics.
Add a feature that allows users to print multiple copies of the same document on one page, reducing paper waste.
